title: What is Microsoft's new Bing with ChatGPT? Here's everything we know
description: Microsoft's AI chatbot has been making headlines because of its advanced capabilities and its memorable outbursts. Here's everything you need to know.

title: Meta's little LLaMA model comes with big benefits for AI researchers
description: Facebook's parent company has released LLaMA, a relatively small but powerful model that should help researchers address the potentially harmful and sometimes wacky pitfalls of AI.

title: How to unsend an email in Gmail
description: With this Gmail feature, you have up to 30 seconds to catch and unsend a grammar mistake, a misspelled name, or even the wrong recipient before it's cast into someone's inbox abyss.

title: Galaxy S23 Plus review: The Goldilocks of Samsung's 2023 smartphone lineup
description: The Samsung Galaxy S23 Plus hits the sweet spot of performance and photography at a price that's just right.

title: I asked ChatGPT to write a short Star Trek episode. It actually succeeded
description: Score another point for things ChatGPT does surprisingly well. But for how long? Not everyone is going to be happy about what ChatGPT can produce, especially the lawyers.

title: Proton VPN review: A very solid VPN with robust leak protection
description: We tested connections to every continent except Antarctica. The big takeaway was how robust Proton VPN is at providing leak protection. But there's more. Read on.

title: Google Pixel's Magic Eraser is finally coming to iPhones (and other Android phones)
description: Magic Eraser is arguably Google's most highly-touted camera feature of recent years. Now, other phone users can get in on the action, as long as they meet one requirement.

title: Microsoft: Here's how our technology disrupts ransomware and phishing attacks
description: Microsoft 365 Defender has AI-based capabilities, which the company says can detect and disable compromised accounts and services attackers are trying to use.

title: These are the most secure countries for remote workers in 2023
description: Here are the countries considered the 'safest' for remote workers, as well as the best countries for connectivity and VPN access.

title: Raspberry Pi Pico just got this handy new Windows Installer
description: Developers using Windows PCs to build for the Raspberry Pi Pico now have a single installer that provides all the tools required.

title: Samsung is looking at satellite connectivity for 5G smartphones
description: Samsung will be integrating the 'non-terrestrial networks' tech into its Exynos modems.

title: Microsoft: This is how we integrated ChatGPT-style tech into Bing search
description: Microsoft explains how it 'grounded' the GPT language model behind Bing Chat with Bing search results.

title: AI art generator: Qualcomm gets Stable Diffusion running on a smartphone
description: As smartphones become increasingly capable, more workloads are moving on-device and off the cloud. Qualcomm's MWC demo showcases the work of its AI research team.

title: Motorola's handy Bluetooth device adds satellite messaging to your iPhone or Android smartphone
description: Need to communicate, but out of Wi-Fi and cellular range? Fear not -- this affordable device could come to your rescue.

title: Rugged Cat S75 and Motorola Defy 2: Android smartphones with two-way satellite connectivity
description: Satellite tech is going mainstream, and Bullitt Group has a head start over its Big Tech rivals, for now.

title: Save $200 on a Shark AI robot vacuum at Amazon
description: Turn your household chore hands-free with the range of robot vacuums on sale at Amazon.

description: Turn your household chore hands-free with the range of robot vacuums on sale at Amazon.

title: Australia retailer's customer data compromised in third-party breach
description: The Good Guys' customer data, including phone numbers and email addresses, have been compromised in a third-party breach that industry observers say is yet another reminder for businesses to scrutinise their suppliers' security practices.

title: The 5 best Apple Watch Series 8 bands of 2023
description: These top Apple Watch bands for Series 8 deliver superior comfort, vibrant styles, and a secure fit.

title: Snag the PlayStation 5 while it's still in stock
description: As stock shortages have subsided, it's now easier to pre-order or purchase the next-generation PlayStation 5. Here's why you should take the plunge, and tips and tricks to get the most out of your new gaming console.

title: The 5 best massage chairs of 2023
description: Work out those kinks and massage away your stress. We compare value, performance, and affordability to find the best massage chairs for your home -- and the Osaki 4D Pro Maestro LE wins our pick for the best massage chair.

title: The Govee smart electric kettle is $20 off right now
description: Jump-start your day with a hot cup of water for your tea or pour-over coffee with this great $20 discount.
